places/ship/the-serenade.html.title: The Serenade
places/ship/the-serenade.html.description: The loss of The Serenade was a casino in deep space meant to be outside of the view of official governments. Some said it was a deep security prison for something that needed to be viewed at all times but before it could be confirmed, The Serenade disappeared without a trace.

sessions/epitaph-protocol/session-2.html.title: Session 2
sessions/epitaph-protocol/session-2.html.description:
Prev: Session 1
Next: Session 3
Storm's Eye Bubble creates a whistle as it attempts to take the brunt of the approaching storm Mechanisms settle down in our mind Enter a drill-bore like structure in the earth Inside is mechanical, houses built inside
Kalervo Turred Leads us to the center “Please take off your shoes upon entering.” woman whos augments make her roughly 7ft tall, extends a hand
Zaera allhaven “Welcome. I hope the ride here wasnt too bad. The winds can be rough.” N: what a fascinating place, are you responsible for the bugs? “No, they’re natural here. What do you think is happening- im here to oversee their evolution.” N: oh i understand. You wanted to meet us?
“Youre the first survivors. I wanted to know how it was. I have a proposal. Do you want to live on kiliv-vi for the rest of your lives?” No “Ill repair your ship if you get bug corpses. More than 2, less than 10.” 26: why put an upper limit? Not that we want to go kill all. “Ill be happy no matter what number.” Al: how many corpses do we have to bring in to get you to repair a specific other ship? “Is it repairable?” Al: yeah it is “Give me the location, ill send out a vehicle to rescue it.” As: what are you wanting the corpses for? “To help evolution. Theres been no successful retrieval up until now. You managed to survive.” (it seems like they lost their leader, lost contact with itself. Tactics are normally used to there being another one they could scurry to. In war, you go to the next leader) As: when would you like this retrieval by? “Midday. I doubt the corpse would survive the heat.” “I have a cargo truck, if you need. I understand the spaceship you got is of great quality, but i could start repairing it while you go out and retrieve the bodies?” Al: if possible- (gets paint chip out of miku-themed blue)
“I have a close fit. If you wish, you could stay here. Aetherion Corporation won’t collect debts on kiliv-vi.”
Al: its important to get miku to her next performance. My manager- that buffoon will- he’ll kill somebody. (signal jammer is controlled by her. Could become a slave for her) (all lines are blocked, but our phone are working. She also doesnt want aetherion observants in case almado’s passive signal has a recorder.) Driving across 10 hour by land vehicle
The Long Mile The bodies are gone Sands reveal no secrets Burying the dead wouldnt make sense, the only reason to do so would be symbolic Maybe eat their dead? But they are herbivores Soft dunes make us go 10ft slower Almado is able to find the hole that leads into the colony, hole in the sands, rises a good 5ft up above the sands rn, done so so that if the sands are higher they dont immediately get buried Begin the repel down Go down into the lower reaches Instantly the branches begin to form (tunnel branches out) 2 lefts, 1 right We go left, see scratches and blood as we go Thoughtsense kicks up, 2 of them Appears theyve added some form of filigree around the side, sides are soft earth Antechamber has no tunnel that leads from it, if the bodies were brought here, they would be beneath our feet Silk spun by the insects to bury their dead in The 2 that buried them are hiding underneath their dead, afraid of It appears they are worshipping a light god, filigree shows a sun and an egg it hatches from. Sun does appear to be on the north facing sun, moon on the top of the ceiling Worshipping the egg in the cave to the north One recognizes divine lance They arent killing each other, if nivaya had to guess, the most likely is that there is a migration going on Creature was about to evolve and change its form, nivaya shot it 2 we didnt kill were burned Our crashed ships: Looking at a chaff based thing, no emergency signals went out, no heat signatures Low energy bomb hit us, caused all of our engines to fail, but does cause us to crash Uncommon, very expensive for militaries to have and only hit important targets If allhaven had enough money, she could get it Attempt to head out Go back 10 more hours Getting back is easier, she gives a signal that lets us know if we’re closer or further from her Various workers and robots begin offloading She meets us outside her house “I heard you got more than enough. Could i offer you a drink?” Xep: alcohol? Soda? “We have various non-named juices.” R: milk? “What kind?” Almado gets Dr. Vesk (meat flavored soda) E-xep-ro gets ‘normal beverage for human’ “Now obviously, there was 1 issue. I will request another favor, of course.” “It appears the vehicle was not salvageable. We were able to take some of the insignias off of it, if you wish.” Al: were you able to salvage the uh. (motions to the mask) “The thing is. It was skewered through and eaten by the local braueri.” N: was it made of plant material? “No, it appears they spit their digestive juices on it in passing.” N: you mentioned you wanted to ask another favor? “Of course. If i could ask, are you going to Nsuoba soon?” Yes “Could you bring the doctoral student Turid with you?” 26: for what purpose? “He needs to go there. I won’t ask where you’re going or why you have a ship that was registered under an aetherion official’s title, and had to scrub, and you wont ask why he needs to go.” N: do we have to bring him back? “No. He will find his own way back or travel with u. Once he’s there he will do his task.” N: i dont see why there would be an issue. Unless there’s someone else who has an issue? (miku is 3 hours late to her performance.) Nivaya pulls zeraph aside for a moment N: i know this seems like a lot to ask, i was very interested in your research, im a student of biology myself, i did come here to seek out that sort of thing. I was wondering if there was any info from your research youd be iwlling to share, i could share what i have so far. I was able to get some information about the bugs we encountered “The bugs are my research, theyre a pinochle of evolution, theyre able to evolve midlife cycle to fit their group. If those 2 survived they mightve been leaders. N: do you know where theyre migrating? “Theyre migrating???” N: there are signs of migration “Thats unfortunate. We’ll have to move. We picked this location bc it was close.” N; theyre moving. (shows her pictures of the filigree and what was seen with the other 2) “They’ve evolved!” looks outside “this is most unprecedented. I wanted to experiment on the vesk, but they were sentient fully by the time we learned of them. This might become the next vesk.” N: have they always been like this? “They were much more violent. (abt to say something)” N: able to adapt as well “Of course. Why else would you come out here?” N: can we stay in contact? “Of course you can contact me at any time.” N: ill be sure to contact if i have anything to share She writes down something, waves us goodbye Turred waits outside “did you have a nice talk?” N: i did! “How was it!” N: it was fiiiine? “Ill be setting myself up in the cargo. If thats alright with you?” N: if thats what you prefer. “I need a lot of room. And the experiments get implosive.”
Able to go to newly refurbished vehicle, 300ft, The Blue Angel Despite its size, handles like a dream Rumbles upon takeoff, able to leave atmosphere, free to go to amongst the Turred takes off for the first time in his life Almado texts manager Overhears ASPER conversation, punches wall and starts texting manager more Contact dead, asset fine
ASPER texts Siryu Get in contact with text, get a call back “Hello, youve reached the impound. Who is calling? “My designation is ASPER. Is siryu there? “Siryu cannot talk. Are you calling to pay the fine? Do u represent Siryu’s company? A: I do
Siryu is currently in holding for murder of Arroyo Cemsor The man who was going to give Miku her first gig A: IDK what this is about “5000 credit fine. Will go to auction if Siryu is held in contempt of court, if you wish to buy the ship back.” As: this seems out of character for her?? “Murder is out of character for most people.” E-xep-ro checks for messages, none Almado is PISSED, making Asper help hatsune miku
Approach Nsuoba Lower part made of underwater caves, various unique fruits Able to make wine-like Nsuobier
Begin landing, have to pass by rusty curiosity that is currently impounded Looks like it underwent surgery, standard practice to prevent invisible creatures/holdouts Warn abt venting the air out, you may show yourself and be arrested normally Siryu is planetside, mildly injured, conscious She may have punched someone when they attempted to arrest her Land the ship on the raining planet, central city itself. Traffic controller boards, looks at nivaya “could you sign here please?” Almado tries to look “not you please, this is a free city” Corp has tried to incorporate the planet, have failed “Could you sign?” N: what? “The ship landing. To say that this is your ship.” N: well it is ours “So could you sign?” (this isnt a contract, but it will be signaled out in case we’re wanted. More a check to see if we are a pirate. Odd legalese of the planet (cant sleep in ship if parked)) Nivaya signs “Welcome to nsuoba. Is there anywhere you wish to go, if you lack signal for some reason?” Al: we dont lack signal “Good my job is done” leaves Miku and co goes to the studio Odd looking building, not quite a studio but it is labeled clearly on the map as such
The Dredge Al: ripley open the door youre the first fan here. I wont charge you! Drying room bc of the rain
Dive bar, dwarven gentleman Korrim Vale “You’re not supposed to be here!” M: SORRY WE’RE LATE Al: we got hung up “Are you here to stock the shelves…?” Al: here for the show “This is a bar. This is a non-live music bar. We had to tear out the karaoke machine with the sailors.” Al: we were supposed to meet arroyo “My boss? He’s dead. Gutless pig got what was coming to him.” Al: there will be a performance. “Theres no one here but me and you.” Almado checking texts with Maikeru “Youre not allowed back there, send me the files.” He disappears for a bit, comes back “I should offload this before the cops come. Would you be interested in buying any cocaine by chance?” “Do try to ignore everything else back here.” guns, ammo, sniper rifle, payphone (the pin is correct, this is supposed to be a venue but the picture is entirely different)) “Hes a fan of the old world.” hands over a dollar bill with coke on it Ripley gets miku’s signature “Would you like any of the hard money? I took the credits out of the safes.” “Take as much as you want. We ran out of toilet paper weeks ago. Ive been using this for less savory business.” Al: so arroyo “The bastard. Worked for aetherion. Youre just working the job. You wouldnt be here if you werent working it.” Al: gotta do what you gotta do “Its a shit company. I should know, family comes from there.” Al: the company’s not bad, pretty good gig “Well, he wanted to open up the planet. Probably why he got murked.” Al: any idea? I heard it was a cultivator “No? Pilot. Pahtra.” Hands over a datapad, shows she was at the scene of the crime with a gun 26: reasonable to be nervous when people are to be murdered Al: i havent been able to contact my manager, means im next “Youre next?” Al: yeah for promotion Al: 26 another bump on me 26: please call me the 26 laws of power Al: we have a murder to solve 26: we supposed we can leverage our understanding of the universe to leverage such matters Al: it would be a karmically good thing to solve a murder, yes? 26: itd aid in our heavenly tribulation, yes! Al: hey where’d you get that coke “IDK. same place he gets his weapons.” Most of the weapons are incendiary “I wouldnt open that one. Theres currently security on the other side. Itll shoot even me. Probably his personal stash.” Electronic and normal lock 6 bots explode, combat
Invisible creature (Ayla) who throws xep around
“Cmon, mommy and daddy want you nivaya. It’s time to go home.” Al: are you just here for the kid? “Yeah ill take him and leave.” N: do you think now is the time for me to be immobilized? “Its fine, ill protect you. I just need to bring you back and if you suffer a bit on the way it’s fine” N: are they here?? “No, they have better things to do than chase after a (smth) son” Woman doesnt move like a typical elf Restrains nivaya Al: nivaya is a contracted employee of the aetherion corporation. This WILL be reported N: im in the middle of a very important research project. Are they trying to get in the way of my research? “IDK” N: i thought they wanted me to pursue this “IDK. they just want you back alive.” N: could we all go? Im sure my parents would love to meet all my friends “Theyre a bad influence.” N: ill go without struggle! “Youre barely struggling” N: if they cant support me, ill just kill myself “Here, i’ll make sure i cant” points gun at hands R: if you move, ill shoot him in the head “Go ahead and try. You dont have it in you. I could threaten to shoot everyone else in the room and you still wouldnt shoot him.” Xep, gun to nivaya’s head: this is a person who would rather die than be in captivity. She drops the leash She walks out and waits, gun still to the back of the head of 26 26: we dont enjoy guns at the back of our brain “No one does jackass.” Combat ends There was so much cocaine and personal weapons and a cracked open safe Stuff is missing, datasticks and the like were stolen from the safe Guy who died was trying to turn the area into a monopoly, only parts he doesnt own are public sector parts Owns his own vineyards, (sailing) ports, has a real concert hall, sports arenas. All on the up and up beyond having to engage in some shady business The white angels emerge victorious once more

sessions/epitaph-protocol/session-3.html.title: Session 3
sessions/epitaph-protocol/session-3.html.description:
Prev: Session 2
Next: Session 4
Nsuoba The Dredge
Dwarf Korrim Vale shows up with 2 giant bottles of vodka Hes gonna light up
He says that we are gonna be used as witnesses to Siryu doing this “Im gonna go delete security footage.” Al: how much insurance?
“Itll just go to his family, not me.” Al: tell you what, we’ll look around and decide just how much “Im just gonna go destroy the security footage and you think about it”
Ayla “we dont need to do that. Nivaya can just go back to their parents” (Nivaya's Mom, Nivaya's Dad)
“It would kill you too, and youre too much of an asset you could work for me, we could split the pay. Im sure Aetherion Corporation would love to have an in with a royal family. An iconoclast.” What?????? AS: how much are you being paid to retrieve nivaya?
“Credits? 50k. And an in with a meeting with the Camacho Family.” N: isnt there something we could work out? We help you, you help us out by letting me go?
“I work with the Hynarion Circle.”
Iconoclast are religious family that are scholars that go against the norm to create evolution in the empire, whatever the major party is they are trained to oppose it. Perma devils advocate. Argue in political sphere all go to nice colleges Circle = Shrub Mob, druid mafia Their leader has arranged with things that are impossible to arrange with, doing biodiversity before space travel was common. Dirt and plants if you blow them up, they help the ecosystem, incredibly hostile to people who hop on them without proper clearance. Shrub mob has somehow gotten that clearance “So. why not go back to mom and pa?” N: you mentioned you owe the hynarion circle, could we help?
(Theyre looking with an in with the Concord of Aedryn. You could very much help with that) “Listen. Youre not gonna escape me. You can disguise yourself as much as you want and i’ll still find you. Youre going around with 2 neon blue haired… people?” Al: im marked as equipment Xep: oh same “Then you understand this is just a job, i have to make a living out of it. Im just gonna follow you around, and should the guard drop, then i’ll get you. Ive already found the ones who are willing to kill you.” “Do you think the aetherion corp will like the news of the assassination of an embassy leader’s child.” (xep is playing minesweeper and has a gun to nivaya’s head)
Lights flicker, tv turns on, shows a bit of kiliv-vi with the egg Phones go off with salacious ads and porn It is entirely possible we had a phantom message in that closet we opened. Those bots jammed signals until they were dead
(ads about The Serenade) During the disappearance, many board members went missing and were lost. This was later created by the great uplifting that shows that people can always go up higher than they were. She looks down at her own phone “Ill leave you alone for now. Youre free to go over, the plants will whisper to me, and the fish.” Xep: birds? “I’ve never seen the birds.” (this world is 0.1% too heavy for birds) N: oh ok. Uh. lets go ASPER sees an injured dog Heals it 26: GREETINGS MORTAL WE ARE THE 26 ALWS OF POWER “I know jackass. Your companion is much kinder.” 26: what should we call you? “Ayla.” 26: travelling companions. We have determined that this dog is the bounty hunter. Miku maps lead us to the right place, approach a governmental building Gov building Approach the clerk, veskian, has tusk Asper registers as friend to visit siryu Through a speaker, make contact with her Smiles “ive finally been arrested for something I didn’t do” A: that is not as reassuring as one would hope “Then evidence will come up that i didn’t do it. That’s what ur god believes right? A: what happened? We went to the dredge “I went to find somewhere to get a drink with people like me. Instead i found a stage with a murdered body and the police had been called as soon as i arrived. I attempted to (and i swear) figure out what was wrong and my gun went off on its own A: how does that happen? “Idk, a policeman tackled me right after. They tased me and pepper sprayed me 5 times A: that’s so cruel. Are you alright now? Beyond being contained? “That’s a lot to go beyond but no immediate danger. Trial is slated for 1 revolution or 60 days A: I shall do my best to ensure that nothing comes of this. I believe that there is a bigger conspiracy at hand Cameras and people all around us. No weapons or implements
“If there’s a conspiracy I know one that could tell u about it. One Velu Shineleaf A: velu shineleaf? “A halfling, one of the moon people.” Come from a humanoid moon A: I will do my best to try and find out what this velu shineleaf might know. Is there anything that I can do while ur in there and im out here? “Find evidence to free me, investigate the stage maybe? A: where is this stage? I understand there’s a bar but there’s no stage “Well i tried to go to the bar and wound up at the stage
A: maybe if we go to the bar we’ll wind up at the stage? Well I will do my best to find out the truth. May aeryn-vox guide me. And if i find anything i’ll come back as soon as possibly Time is up and both are pulled away. We can come back tomorrow for 5 more minutes Ayla shows up with a car “Nivaya would you like a ride to not be in the rain?” N: no im good Walking, the car slowly follows Cars behind her the whole time, holding up traffic Heading to the stage Incredibly drunk and less than reputable people stuck outside, confused Entire area has already been recorded Stage is right there, you arent allowed to use it before the murder has been solved or it was cleared Cops here to stop people from going in, we’re allowed to go past, we’re the people on the venue ticket Al: whos in charge here?
“That would be the Kalo (Kalo Cop).” Weird aquatic man floating staring down “He was murdered yesterday.” 26: greetings we are the 26 laws of power “You are the one that is friend of siryu?” “That person you travel with is friend, murder, stage owner.” Al: yeah idc abt her, it wont affect my impartiality M: HIII!! “You are much more likeable than the other one.” M: ill take it as a compliment! “Not big compliment.” M: what happened here? “Siryu seems to have murdered the owner. Corporate dispute.” M: motive? “It does seem that siryu had voucher from aetherion corp so they could take over certain assets. One death voucher for aetherion.” (way to ensure smaller companies dont become part of the whole, let little wars break out to let the overall higher ups keep control) M: how long ago was she given the voucher? “Does not have date. She may have also killed another. One tech worker known by aetherion. Thrown into ocean. Body never recovered.” 26: what was their name? M: the ocean. Wow!
“Anongies. And one android Y493. M: how did the murder happen? “This one? Gunshot. Many. twice in back of head.” “He was facing towards back. 2 bullets missing from siryu.” “No footage. Siryu master hacker. Incompetence easy to fake.” 26: there seems to be no reason for this to have happened “Why here during murder?” 26: we believe siryu had a similar problem. When attempting to input the address of this location in a mapping software, it brought up the address of a dive bar known as the dredge. To arrive here, we had to input the address of dive bar. M: can we help with the investigation? Pleeease “Investigative rights. But speak of it no one. And accept that siryu may be murderer.” Looking around Office with a contract that just needs 2 signatures Ask xep to forgery Almado signs it, thumb print Could record entire videos here after for 2 whole days Personal computer, dont seem security related Various documents, various transactions most are above the board, some are not This is dual authenticated. Banking system hosted offworld, you can add copies cannot remove. Kinda like the blockchain Somehow, a few transactions are missing. Notes on the local computer are personal notes abt things hes agreed to sell. Removed, requires a master hacker or someone at all locations that was able to delete all of them at once in a coordinated effort
Would have to be within system, most likely Kiliv-vi or Voya Level of skill achievable by humanoid? Lvl 20 tho or a 0 day kind of hack (built into the system) Safe has been opened, police tape on it, uncloseable Taken everything from the safe as evidence (asper knows that siryu’s gun had a targeting system that would limit the kickback. Would still be hard to hack) Need 2 days to clear their gun with the courts Almado breaks into a room, aetherion corp property damage 2 computers, security guard booth Large screen that shows all the cameras in the area Missing footage exactly around the time of the murder Fantastic job At one point, able to see slightly not fully scrubbed. Able to see the outline of a copaxi man (sentient coral reef), walking away during one of the cuts. Enough that if it were being hacked really fast, wouldve been missed We download it rq Ripley grabs the cop He looks “copaxi. They live here, yes. Near ocean. But all is ocean.” Xep: around time of murder “Oh. anything else?” Al: someone tried to remove them Xep: we think. The level of soficistation has the level of hacks would make them galaxy known. Maybe that is not known. “Good hacker not known to galaxy, good hacker known to few.” Xep: this is approaching the limit of capability. It involved hacking into a banking system. And a gun. “Not good. Serious business.” Xep: someone at that level would “Push back the trial then. 2 years? (120 days)” “We’ll do request. Copaxi not enough to go on, plenty here.” 26: is the afact that they are missing from all footage except this one suspicious “Yes, but i cannot arrest ever copaxi that i see.” “Computer underwater do not work so good.” “Many live on shore to use computer, but some have vacuum tube.” Xep: if you had a lot, would it be a noticeable amount of vaccuum tubes. “Yes, but at that point, easier to live on land, no?” Xep: perhaps more comfortable underwater “Maybe,” Al: miku. I need you to tell that cop that it is very important for us to see the world like the victim did so you can get on that goddamn stage. I need you on that stage for 15 seconds. 1 picture. Holoshop can do the rest. M: do you mind if i stand on the stage to feel what the man felt before he died? “Of course” (internet was found not created. Credits are tiny computers. All planets had some form of credits of some density on them. Small cloud computing hardware, innately valuable) Puts a hologram of the dead guy The lividity seems fresh but the wound is old. Blood kept pumping despite him already being dead. Hey whats with this “We considered it a glitch with the system.” Almado phone call
Mr Sakodo is in another system Al: mr sakodol, things are going wrong. I recruited some interns. I got some decent photos, but the concert might not happen. I need insurance, stat. Going to Velu Shineleaf Hes an infomation broker, if you kill one your secrets will be leaked Hes simply here bc he likes the local liquor that is brewed here. He was a big shot in the aedryn but holds no love there Ayla doesnt follow us in N: do you want to come inside? “No.” Approach halfling man, sitting behind desk. Stops playing video game “Might i help you?” R: whatcha playing (first person shooter, but when he disconnects, everyone pauses) “Could i offer you anything? Cigar? Liquor?” M: i dont think i can have that “Of course, you want more cocaine, almado?” Al: yeah. “Im willing to work with you if youre going to work with me. What are you here for? The murder, or the stalkin’, nivaya?” N: not the stalking “Shes a real bitch, but she means well. Or is it about the ship?” N: the ship? “The unregistered one.” “How might i help yall?” As: we came at the advice of siryu “Lovely lady As: i believe so “Shame about the accusation, especially since it’s false As: i’m glad u believe that “At least 20% false, 60% true but I’m a dreamer As: i don’t think those numbers are true “Do you have numbers to back it up? As: no “Then 40 and 60 it’ll be E: Showing him the Copaxi “this might change your outlook “That is someone that is around the time of the murder. Few hours before the murder at the earliest. He appeared at a few meetings following that. Not the murderer, maybe an accomplace. Siryu knows a few. I might be able to find out who that is” A: what do you want in return? “I have some performers that went missing. I could do with finding them, hopefully today. You have a ship? A: we do, do you think we could find them within a day? “If you try ur hardest i think u could find it within urself to find them in a day Miku: we’ll try our best! “I have their last known location and what they look like. Is that sufficient? A: it should be “1 question if found, 2 if getting info should they perish, none if killed for 2nd question.” M: contact info? “Do not call me. Meet me in person. Info online is able to be stolen. Information real life, well, theyd have to beat you up in an alley.” Al: speaking of contact info, (to xep) whats your comm id? Xep: you dont want to be in my phone contacts when they find this. I will give you my number, but if you text me, if they find this phone, they’ll find yours. “Hopefully thisll clear up some of your questions, some of mine, we’ll keep this on the down low.” 26: we would find this agreeable “Even the one that worships that talkative bitch in the stars? As: do you mean me or someone else? “You’re the one that worships the goddess who cares about freedom of information right? As: I am still coming to terms with how I face the world. I do not know if I can agree to this arrangement. “Well, youll come back, see how you feel when you get the paycheck. There is no cash, only credit.” “You could take that ship, say i sent you, if you want to abandon siryu, you can. Ayla wont bother you. Her master wont be pleased if she interrupts something for me.” “Permanent breather from her if you leave nivaya and leave.” Go to spaceship One of workers looks, “im sorry this ship doesnt have a name. Do you know what it is?”
The Blue Angel
Oh Kalervo Turred is still here “I have good news! I dont know how i know it. You have been forgiven for your crime!” “The dreams?” Do you always have these dreams?? “No!” (he does seem to have bumped his hand, it didnt scab, but splintered, and then healed up.) “Its a good thing no?” Its good to be forgiven? “Forgiveness is good. Ill tell it to my dream. Is forgiveness paramount to vengeance?” As: why do you ask such questions? “Im trying to figure it out. Ive lived my entire life in that area.” M: miku believes that everyone deserves a 2nd chance Al: in a non-financial way. Wait i need that 2nd chance. Capitalism always gives 2nd chances
N: you mentioned that you were doing research on the ship for Zaera Allhaven, could you tell me more? “About evolution of course. Its all vague to me now. I remember back then we were doing research on evolution chains on how beings became sentient.” N: any progress? “I have. But of course she took it. It is her right.” N: on this ship? “No, ive been experiencing things, enjoying things. Ive recently discovered that there are ways to find companions in this world.” “Do you have trouble with a companion, nivaya?” N: so. More about your research. Do you have a family? “I was born there, i was adopted when i was quite young by m’lady.” “No one remembers much about their birth.” (26 remembers their birth, birthed from the brain) N: she told you to come here and experience things? “Yes” N: what did she say “To live my life a little, gave me a sum of credits, i did stuff, i learned many things, and i came back here because thats what im supposed to do.” N: are you to be with us? “If you’ll have me.” (drops something under nivayas sheets)
(its a book titled “Playing the Game - How to Drive Women Wild”) Al: did she give you a comm unit? “Of course.” Al: how many credits? “Not that many.” Al: ballpark? “30k? Xep: how many did you start with? “Before i met those nice ladies? 200k.” Al: never spend more than 1k in one sitting. Ok kid? “They charged me 10k per lady.” Al: youre still standing? “Of course, why wouldnt i be?” As: what did you learn there? “They gave me kisses, as adults do.” (we look at our bank Almado: Truth Miku: Missing Xep: Scene ASPER: Voyage 26: Oceans Nivaya: wont say Xep tries to hack in, it should be simpler but is an infinite void as theyre sucked across time and space. Back into reality. Similar to the circuitry Xep: the fuck is wrong with your phone? Ripley: Sacrifice) Flying, rainbow on the oceans below, prism-like effect Unique geometric shapes, starships that didnt survive landing that fell below Continue to myriad of jungles that make the greenery of planet, land Find signal flares where the last group left, even if their comms unit broke Takes a little bit Crash investigators wave and smile at us “why are you here?” Not cops, these are his men “Found the ship.” Al: heres the plan. Miku. (sets up a chair for her) 26: we were passed by velu shineleaf to find your location. “You found us. Can we go home? There is much to report.” 26: we heard there were 3 of you. “One fell into the ocean.” (they believe this to be the ocean, and not just a pond. It appears to have a bottom and salty bc of the land, but isnt the ocean.) Xep: what are you looking for when getting back to the city? “Booze and sex.” Xep: that bar you go to, whats the name?
“Sexico 6.” (theres no sexico 6 on the planet) (we know the guy whos been to the brothel. Nivaya texts him abt the name of it. He went to the starlace)
Al: have you been to The Starlace? “We like booze and women, like you.” (only ASPER can roll: they both seem to have what seems to be blood around the mouth slits of their breathing apparatus. Something crawled into their corpses and posessed their bodies. They want us to bring them back to civilization. One completely wiped it clean, one only partially.) Xep gets a sneaky pic “Why do you need photography?” Xep: waht are you guys “People who want to go home.” Xep: you are possessing corpses. I do need to know why before letting you on the ship “Circle of life. Had to do it.” Xep: are you some sort of creature that lives in others? “Yes.” Xep: did you kill them? “Not relevant. We found them.” Xep: how often do you need new corpses? “Often to propagate.” “Make if need.” Xep: that does have the connotation that it is something you enjoy doing “Do you enjoy killing? Do you enjoy fucking?” N: what did kill them? “Circumstance kill all. Search this area, unlucky, we in area first. Trap, kill. We lay. One fall into deep reach, cannot reach, cannot breathe salt.” Xep: did you make the trap? “Does not matter. They are dead.” Xep: what was the trap? “Trap was simple. Shot through head. Spike.” Xep: through the ship? Or they got out? “They not part of ship. Ship part of them. Too old to eat. Too old to take. Came here, ate trap, be thankful.” “Trap spectacular. Kill without blood. Soul ripped from body. Not from trap.” Xep: what did you do with it? “See soul escape body. They scream. Nothing we can do but take body. Only wish for more. Would it not bring comfort to see loved ones moving around as if alive?” “You would not care, ripley, to have a loved one “No name is ripley. Necrophiliac ripley. Wish could fuck other. Bad situation. Monster to us.”
R: no i just miss him???? I dont want to see him animated like a weird thing??? (might be reading akashic record, cntrl+f grief) Aedrynic Al: we’re not taking you back Points their guns at almado Combat:
Threllopex
Kassa-Raell

info_showOrphanNodes.description: Show nodes that are not connected to any other nodes.

info_showAttachments.description: Show attachments like images and PDFs as nodes in the graph.

info_allowGlobalGraph.description: Allow the user to view the global graph of all nodes.

info_allowExpand.description: Allow the user to pop-out the graph view to take up the whole screen

info_attractionForce.description: How much should linked nodes attract each other? This will make the graph appear more clustered.

info_linkLength.description: How long should the links between nodes be? The shorter the links the more connected nodes will cluster together.

info_repulsionForce.description: How much should nodes repel each other? This will make disconnected parts more spread out.

info_centralForce.description: How much should nodes be attracted to the center? This will make the graph appear more dense and circular.

info_edgePruning.description: Edges with a length above this threshold will not be rendered, however they will still contribute to the simulation. This can help large tangled graphs look more organised. Hovering over a node will still display these links.

info_minNodeRadius.description: How small should the smallest nodes be? The smaller a node is the less it will attract other nodes.

info_maxNodeRadius.description: How large should the largest nodes be? Nodes are sized by how many links they have. The larger a node is the more it will attract other nodes. This can be used to create a good grouping around the most important nodes.

info_allowResizing.description: Whether or not to allow the sidebars to be resized

info_allowCollapsing.description: Whether or not to allow the sidebars to be collapsed

info_leftDefaultWidth.description: The default width of the left sidebar
